attributes.action: The 10pm pub and bar law must go.
attributes.additional_details:
Hundreds of thousands of jobs will be lost.
Companies will go bust.
More trouble on the streets whilst all closing at the same time in city centres.
Consider non food premises to open later with restrictions.
SAVE OUR PUBS AND CLUBS WHILST BEING SAFE.
attributes.background:
Allow pubs and bars to open as usual.
Consider allowing pubs to choose any 10 hour slot within their licencing allowance at least.
